Text: RE Rockets GameIf Enrons stock doesnt go up you may get left out this time too Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Murray Bill Subject RE Rockets Game Ill be there Since I got left out last time Original Message From Murray Bill ammondsHomescomENRON Sent Tuesday November PM To Williams Jason Trading Michael Green Email Wayne Green Email Cc Tara Green Email Subject Rockets Game Great News Guys Ron gave us his floor seats for the Phoenix game on Wednesday December PM Please let me know if you can make the game See ya Bub This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

TEN BEST THINGS TO SAY IF YOU GET CAUGHT SLEEPING AT YOUR DESKTradingpst They told me at the blood bank this might happen This is just a minute power nap like they raved about in that timemanagement course you sent me to Whew Guess I left the top off the WhiteOut You probably got here just in time I wasnt sleeping I was meditating on the mission statement and envisioning a new paradigm I was testing my keyboard for drool resistance I was doing a highly specific Yoga exercise to relieve workrelated stress Are you discriminating toward people who practice Yoga Why did you interrupt me I had almost figured out a solution to our biggest problem The coffee machine is broken Someone mustve put decaf in the wrong pot And the best thing to say if you get caught sleeping at your desk and in Jesus name Amen

Mucky DuckTradingpst What are yalls yalls yalls other is there a correct spelling for slang plans for this evening Jason are you coming home first or staying downtown Our babysitter is getting to the house at PM If yall want to ride together just let us know See ya Bub
Bob Maureens Lake HouseTradingpst Attached are pictures of the newest addition to the lake house Mike Kelley friends of ours took these pictures last week See ya Bub fishbmp fishbmp fishbmp fishbmp

on Thursday Cc Tradingpst Its that time again If you are up for playing this Thursday please let me know Well kick things off around PM So far I have verbal commitments from Jason Von and Mike I was hoping to get two tables going and try to play a round robin tourney So Todd its been a couple of weeks Scott you said that you wanted to play Hatch you had fun last time right and Ferg you dont want to miss the fun do you reply to this email and let me know you can make it See ya Bub

RE on ThursdayTradingpst I wanted to give everyone an update on whos coming over tonight Were one short for two tables Please let me know if you find someone that can play Chris Hatcher In Von Jones In Mike Morrison In may be a little late Bill Murray In Mike Peck In Todd Perry In Jason Williams In David Burns No Reply Mike Clark Too far to drive Chris Ferguson Going fishing Gregg Murray Working late Scott Walton Going on vacation Original Message From Murray Bill Sent Tuesday June PM To Bill Murray Email Chris Ferguson Email Chris Hatcher Email Jason Williams Email Mike Morrison Email Rhonda Von Jones Email Scott Walton Email Todd Perry Email Cc Gregg Murray Email Clark Mike Peck Mike David Burns Email Subject on Thursday Its that time again If you are up for playing this Thursday please let me know Well kick things off around PM So far I have verbal commitments from Jason Von and Mike I was hoping to get two tables going and try to play a round robin tourney So Todd its been a couple of weeks Scott you said that you wanted to play Hatch you had fun last time right and Ferg you dont want to miss the fun do you reply to this email and let me know you can make it See ya Bub
Rockets Game Cc Great News Guys Ron gave us his floor seats for the Phoenix game on Wednesday December PM Please let me know if you can make the game See ya Bub

BFKSTradingpst Heres the link Put me down as the recruiter and specify the May event at Emerald Bowl It should be a lot of fun Sharon Evan Riley Keith Gregg Murray Victoria Greg Hammonds and Jason Hammonds will all be up there Thanks for participating Bub htmlfpformsbowlathonteamreghtm

Bones Tradingpst Is anyone interested in playing bones at my place on Thursday May around PM Do yall know of anyone else in the area that plays that I can add to my list See ya Bub Office x Mobile Home

DominosTradingpst Jason The following replied to my original email Ferg Pretty sure gotta check with my wife Hatcher I am up for playing Scott I might be I need to talk to Kathy about it first Von see you then Jason no email reply but his assumed answer is I dont reply until the very latest possible time so that I have an opportunity to look at all of my options and chose the one that matches my interest that particular day hour or minute Actually Jason told Sharon that he was in last night but he may change his mind after that dig Mike out Todd out We definitely have three Von Jason and me If all of the maybes come Ferg Hatcher Scott we will have six Please confirm if you can make it tonight Thanks Bub Original Message From Williams Jason mailtoJason NRONcom Sent Thursday May AM To Bill billm Email Subject Do we have enough guys tonight to have a game
